name: GD AutoBot Trainer (Deterministic)
description: Fast-forward trainer that evolves an input path using real engine collisions, then replays best at normal speed

updates-per-frame.name: Training Speed (updates per frame)
updates-per-frame.description: How many real GD updates to execute per rendered frame (100 = ~100x if CPU can keep up). Deterministic.

inner-time-budget-ms.name: Inner Time Budget (ms)
inner-time-budget-ms.description: Limits CPU time per rendered frame so the game doesn’t freeze.

max-frames.name: Max Frames Per Attempt
max-frames.description: Failsafe; restarts if attempt runs too long.

mutation-window.name: Mutation Window (frames)
mutation-window.description: Mutate around the last death frame ± window.

prefix-lock-margin.name: Prefix Lock Margin (frames)
prefix-lock-margin.description: How many frames BEFORE best death remain mutable. Higher = less stable, lower = more stable.

mutation-ops.name: Mutation Ops Per Attempt
mutation-ops.description: How many tap insert/remove edits to apply each new attempt.

tap-length.name: Tap Length (frames)
tap-length.description: How long an inserted tap holds.

seed-tap-rate.name: Seed Tap Density
seed-tap-rate.description: How often taps appear in the first attempt (lower = fewer taps).

verify-after-win.name: Verify After Win
verify-after-win.description: After a win, replay best at normal speed to confirm.
